name: @mitre/nuxt-smartscript
description: Smart typography transformations for Nuxt - automatic superscript, subscript, and symbol formatting
author: SAF Team <saf@mitre.org>

scripts.dev: npm run dev:prepare && nuxi dev playground
scripts.dev:prepare: nuxt-module-build build --stub && nuxt-module-build prepare && nuxi prepare playground
scripts.release: npm run lint && npm run test && npm run prepack && changelogen --release && git push --follow-tags
scripts.release:minor: npm run lint && npm run test && npm run prepack && changelogen --release --minor && git push --follow-tags
scripts.release:patch: npm run lint && npm run test && npm run prepack && changelogen --release --patch && git push --follow-tags
scripts.release:major: npm run lint && npm run test && npm run prepack && changelogen --release --major && git push --follow-tags
